message.content:
cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR. 

This paper deals with natural language processing (NLP) and computer vision (CV) tasks, specifically image description generation. Therefore, cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also discusses the categorization of negation uses, which falls under the scope of sentiment analysis, making cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Learning) likely sub-categories as well. Additionally, the paper involves the analysis of a large corpus, which could be categorized under cs.IR (Information Retrieval). Finally, since the paper deals with image description, it could also be categorized under cs.CV (Computer Vision).
